thread.title: A touch of class
thread.title_full: A touch of class - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Leigh S
title: A touch of class
text: I popped into the hotel bar for a coffee with a friend. The coffees were accompanied by a slice of cake. A lovely touch. However, I have a dairy intolerance, so in an extremely optimistic manner, asked the waiter if the cake had dairy in (they always do). After checking with the kitchen, he told me it did and seamlessly brought me a slice of dairy-free cake instead. Pure class. Oh, and the cake was delicious.
